attributes.title: How To Become a Hero!
attributes.description:
20 AUGUST 2020

*FIRST LET US OFFER OUR WORSHIP TO PARAMASHIVA GANAPATI AS PART OF GANESH BRAHMOTSAVAM, THEN ENTER INTO THE SATSANG.

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*LIFE IS THE NAVARASA NATAKA, NAVARASA NATYA BETWEEN WHAT YOU BELIEVE AS YOU (INNER IMAGE), WHAT YOU PROJECT YOURSELF AS YOU TO OTHERS (OUTER IMAGE), WHAT ACTUALLY OTHERS BELIEVE AS YOU (OTHER’S IMAGE), WHAT YOUR ENEMIES ARE TRYING TO PROJECT ABOUT YOU (ENEMY’S IMAGE!)

*IF YOU IMAGINE YOUR LIFE AS A MOVIE - BOLLYWOOD, TOLLYWOOD, KOLLYWOOD, SANDALWOOD, ANY WOOD (!), THE INNER IMAGE YOU REALLY HAVE ABOUT YOU IS A HERO. THE OUTER IMAGE YOU PROJECT ABOUT YOU TO OTHERS IS HEROINE. THE IMAGE YOUR ENEMIES WANT TO BUILD ABOUT YOU IS THE VILLAIN. THE IMAGE ACTUALLY OTHERS BELIEVE IS THE AUDIENCE!

*SPEND LITTLE TIME THINKING, VISUALISING THIS EXAMPLE. MAN WHO PUTS TIME, TREASURE, TALENT, ENERGY, EVERYTHING, ON HIS INNER IMAGE AND CONSCIOUSLY BUILDS IT, WINS THE GAME. HE BECOMES THE HERO FOREVER.

*MOVIES’ CLIMAXES ARE NOT CONCLUSIONS. MANY TIMES LIFE CONTINUES AFTER THE MOVIE CLIMAX. IN THE MOVIE THEY SHOW ‘THEY HAPPILY LIVED EVER AFTER’. IF YOU LIVE AFTER THAT ONLY YOU WILL UNDERSTAND!

*ANYONE WHO WANTS HEROIC CONCLUSIONS ABOUT YOUR LIFE, PUT YOUR TIME, TREASURE, TALENT ON WORKING ON YOUR INNER IMAGE. YOUR INNER IMAGE IS THE CONSCIOUS BLUEPRINT OF YOU.

*EVEN IF YOU SPEND 6 MONTHS, 1 YEAR OR 2 YEARS, SPEND TIME AND MAKE IT HAPPEN.

*SIMPLEST THING: JUST CONQUER YOUR JUNK-HUNGRY PATTERN, NOT EVEN YOUR HUNGER FOR REAL FOOD, YOUR HUNGER FOR JUNK FOOD, OR IF YOU CONQUER EATING NON-VEGETARIAN FOOD, STOP THIS DESTRUCTIVE PLASTIC FOOD - FOOD LIKE PRODUCTS, NOT THE REAL FOOD WHICH CAN CREATE A STRONG PATTERN OF ADDICTION IN YOU AND SEND STRONG SIGNALS INSIDE YOUR SYSTEM DEMANDING THAT THE SAME FOOD BE SUPPLIED TO YOU.

*THE VISUAL, TASTE AND THE WAY IT SHAKES YOUR WHOLE NERVOUS SYSTEM AND DECISION MAKING SYSTEM ONCE YOU ARE ADDICTED TO THAT JUNK FOOD, YOU ARE FORCED TO PICK THEM UP AGAIN.

*THE MODERN DAY MARKETING TECHNOLOGY HAS DESTROYED INTEGRITY, COMPROMISED INTEGRITY, GONE TO THE EXTREME, FOR THE SAKE OF MARKETING. THEY WILL DO ANYTHING - FROM THE TOUCH, SOFTNESS OF THE FOOD, EVERYTHING IS DESIGNED AND THE INTEGRITY TO YOUR HEALTH IS ABSOLUTELY COMPROMISED. IT GOES TO THE EXTENT OF CRIMINALLY CONSPIRING TO DESTROY YOUR HEALTH SO THAT PHARMACEUTICAL INDUSTRY CAN MAKE MONEY OUT OF YOUR LIFE.

*THE FOOD LIKE PRODUCTS ARE DESIGNED TO GIVE FOOD TO ALL YOUR FIVE SENSES AND THE MUSIC ASSOCIATED WITH THE RESTAURANTS AND COMMERCIALS IS ALL UNCONSCIOUSLY RECORDED BY YOU AND KEPT INSIDE. IF YOU ARE LITTLE AWARE, YOU CAN SEE, WHENEVER YOU SEE THAT FOOD, AUTOMATICALLY THAT SAME MUSIC PLAYS INSIDE YOU. IF YOU ARE LITTLE CONSCIOUS AND HAVE THE CAPACITY TO UNCLUTCH, YOU CAN UNDERSTAND WHAT I AM SAYING. THE FOOD THEY ADVERTISE IMPACTS YOUR EYES, TOUCH, SENSE, YOUR SMELL SENSE, AND UNCONSCIOUSLY EVEN WITH YOUR MUSIC SENSE.

*ESCAPE! SAVE YOURSELF FROM THE FOOD-LIKE PRODUCTS. PHD’S ARE EMPLOYED TO DO RESEARCH AND ENHANCE THE SALT TASTE. AS SOON AS THE POTATO CHIP ENTERS THE MOUTH, IT SHOULD TERRORISE YOUR SENSE. NOBODY BOTHERS ABOUT YOUR HEALTH. SO YOU HAVE TO TERRORISE YOUR SENSES. THE MOMENT YOU SEE THE VISUAL, LIKE A SLAVE, PIG, YOUR MIND SAYS, “GET ME THAT.” YOU GRAB IT AND EAT THAT SHIT.

*EVEN IF YOU KNOW MANY TIMES THAT THIS JUNK FOOD HAS FLESH OF ANIMALS AND HAS SHIT OF ANIMALS (!), THE TONGUE IS SO POWERFUL, IT DOES NOT ALLOW YOU TO LOOK INTO THE INGREDIENTS.

*MY GURUKUL KIDS ARE BLESSED BECAUSE THEY ARE GIVEN THE BEST FOOD, ALMOST 100%. IF THEY DON'T GO FOR VACATION BACK TO THEIR HOME, THEY ARE 100% PURE SATVIC BODY BECAUSE THERE IS NO SHIT ADDED INTO THEM.

*BLESSED ARE THOSE KIDS WHO NEVER WENT BACK HOME AND HAD THAT JUNK SHIT AS FOOD.

*THERE IS NOTHING TO LEARN IN THE WORLD. TILL 25 IF YOU JUST KEEP YOURSELF AS A PURE BRAHMACHARI, WITH HEALTHY BODY, NO TOXINS THAT IS ENOUGH. YOUR ENERGY IS THE CURRENCY FOR YOUR LIFE.

*I KNOW WHAT REALLY NEEDS TO BE TAUGHT: NOT THAT STUPID MATHS, STUPID THINGS ABOUT BIOLOGY. YOUR BIOLOGY NEEDS TO BE BUILT.

*THE MODERN DAY JUNK FOOD INDUSTRY HAS PUT SO MUCH OF TIME, TREASURE, TALENT TO LITERALLY SEDUCE YOU TO THE LEVEL OF PORNOGRAPHY INDUSTRY.
